name: Teen Patti, Poker & Roulette by Freebird
shortDescription: A high-stakes social casino app featuring Teen Patti, European Roulette, and multiplayer Texas Hold’em Poker with a multiplier system for thrilling gameplay.
fullDescription:
Teen Patti, Poker & Roulette is a complete social casino app by Freebird App Studio LLP, combining popular games in one immersive experience.

Featured Games:

  • Teen Patti (Indian Flush): Play on vibrant tables with traditional rules (Play Blind, Max Chaal, Pot Limit) and advanced variations like Muflis, Lucky 13, Red vs Black, Lowest/Highest Joker, and Ak 47.
  • Texas Hold’em Poker: Compete with players in classic multiplayer Texas Hold’em, featuring a dynamic multiplier system for higher stakes and excitement.
  • European Roulette: Classic European Roulette wheel with a full betting layout for an authentic casino experience.

Key Features:

  • Voice Chat: Communicate with other players in real-time for a social and strategic edge.
  • Competition & Leaderboards: Compete globally or with friends on integrated leaderboards.
  • Virtual Currency: Chips (Lac/Cr) and premium Diamonds, with in-app purchases in ₹.
  • Rewards: Daily Spin & Win, login bonuses, and Invite & Earn free chips.
  • High-Quality Graphics: Detailed, user-friendly visuals that closely mimic real-life casino play.
